title: System Maintenance Scheduled
message: The system will be down for maintenance on August 10 from 2 AM to 4 AM.

title: New Course Materials Available
message: New materials have been uploaded for the AI course.

title: Reminder: Tuition Fee Due
message: Please pay your tuition fees before August 15.

title: Library Closed on Friday
message: The library will be closed for cleaning on Friday.

title: Exam Timetable Released
message: Check the dashboard for your upcoming exam timetable.

message: Cafeteria prices will be updated starting next week.

message: Email system will be upgraded to enhance security.

title: Job Fair Announcement
message: Join us for the annual job fair on August 20.

message: Check out the new arrivals in the library.

title: Scholarship Opportunities
message: Apply for the new scholarship programs by August 30.

message: The new academic year starts on September 1.

title: Health and Safety Guidelines
message: Please follow the updated health and safety guidelines on campus.

message: The new sports facilities are now open for students.

message: Course registration for the next semester ends on July 15.

title: New Faculty Members
message: We welcome new faculty members to our team.
